title: SPINTIRES [R.G. Mechanics] small size, nothing ripped
description:
Title: Spintires Publication Type: License Genre: Simulator , 3D Developer: Oovee Game Studios Year: 2014 Platform: PC Language: Russian, English, French, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Italian, German Medicine: Present (CODEX) Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Core 2 Dual 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB Video Card: 512 MB, Shader Model 3.0, GeForce 9600GT / Radeon HD3850, DirectX 9.0c Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible Free space on HDD: 1 GB Spin Tires unique simulator from companies oovee with realistic graphics and great physics interaction with the surface of the wheels of vehicles. You to manage trucks on the road breaking marshland and water obstacles. In your park will be available initially three models: Maz 535, Oise and Kraz 255B, but you can set the fashion and other equipment which is abundant.

Installation
1. Install the game, following the instructions of the installation.
2. Content folder Codex copy the folder with a game. Play
